revised_title: Horny Excrescences: A Rare Medical Condition
tldr: This article describes a rare medical condition where a young man developed large, horn-like nails on his fingers and toes. The condition began after he had the smallpox and was likely caused by the disease. The man experienced pain when bending the fingers and toes, and the condition was treated by purging. The article includes detailed descriptions and illustrations of the affected fingers and toes.
